name: Meritia mobile
tag_list: mobile-team-automation, j2me, mobile-devices, asset-management, asset-tracking, time-tracking, labor-tracking, job-tracking, time-management, repair-services-tracking, mobile-workforce-management-software, mobile-business-process-management-software, mobi
overview:
Meritia delivers a software platform for portals and companies that wants to ‘go mobile’ without the need to climb the learning curve and/or to worry about compatibility issues.

Meritia has been one of the leading platform providers for the Latin mobile market since 2006, but silicon valley startups has becoming a significant part of the costumer base.

Meritia will be a great provider for web sites launching a â€˜mobileâ€™ presence, companies that wishes to communicate to their costumers thru a new channel or content download storefronts.
